description: This source file defines the `EditNoteActivity` class for an Android app. It facilitates creating or editing a note, handling UI interactions, data binding, and saving notes via a ViewModel. It includes UI setup, data observation, and menu options.

classes.name: EditNoteActivity
classes.description: An activity allowing users to create or update a note, with UI components for input and a ViewModel for data management.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, observes the note data, and loads the note if available.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the menu options for the activity.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections such as saving the note or navigating back.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Collects user input and triggers the ViewModel to save the note, then finishes the activity.
